name: Novice Zapper
text: Spell Damage +1 Overload: (1)
flavor: The novices would prefer that he did not.

name: Gan'arg Glaivesmith
text: Outcast: Give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: When isolation becomes motivation.

name: Illidari Inquisitor
text: Rush. After your hero attacks an enemy, this attacks it too.
flavor: Armed with fear, big eyes, ruthless efficiency, almost fanatical devotion to your hero, and nice brown robes.

name: Fogsail Freebooter
text: Battlecry: If you have a weapon equipped, deal 2 damage.
flavor: Goes cheap on wardrobe so he can spend on weaponry.

name: Taelan Fordring
text: [x]Taunt, Divine Shield Deathrattle: Draw your highest Cost minion.
flavor: After growing up with the Scarlet Crusade for most of his life, Taelan finally realized they were maybe not the nicest people.

name: Overlord Runthak
text: [x]Rush. Whenever this attacks, give +1/+1 to all minions in your hand.
flavor: Knows how to lift everyone up while tearing every enemy down.

name: Thrive in the Shadows
text: Discover a spell from your deck.
flavor: Why would your spells be afraid of the dark? It's easier to nap there.

name: Nozdormu the Eternal
text: [x]Start of Game: If this is in BOTH players' decks, turns are only 15 seconds long.
flavor: Live life in the fast lane. As long as your opponent does too.

name: Arcane Intellect
text: Draw 2 cards.
flavor: Playing this card makes you SMARTER. And let's face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

name: Fireball
text: Deal $6 damage.
flavor: This spell is useful for burning things. If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.

name: Flamestrike
text: Deal $5 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: Aldrachi Warblades
text: Lifesteal
flavor: The ancient Aldrachi were the greatest warriors in the universe. Imagine their power if they'd put the handle at the END of the blade.

name: Holy Nova
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell. Also, you're probably a jerk.

name: Holy Smite
text:
Deal $3 damage
to a minion.
flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are. Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

name: Mark of the Wild
text: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+3. (+2 Attack/+3 Health)
flavor: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

name: Fire Elemental
text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage.
flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

name: Hellfire
text: Deal $3 damage to ALL characters.
flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

name: Backstab
text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.
flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

name: Deadly Poison
text: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells. Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison? Poison Elemental? Nobody wants that.

name: Assassinate
text: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

name: Consecration
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy. But it smells a little, too.

name: Fiery War Axe
flavor: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

name: Execute
text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

name: Raid Leader
text: Your other minions have +1 Attack.
flavor: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"

name: Kobold Geomancer
text: Spell Damage +1
flavor: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
text: Taunt
flavor: Sen'jin Village is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

name: Stormwind Champion
text: Your other minions have +1/+1.
flavor: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he's all bitter and stuff.

name: Tracking
text: Discover a card from your deck.
flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

name: Arcane Shot
text: Deal $2 damage.
flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves. The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

name: Voodoo Doctor
text: Battlecry: Restore #2 Health.
flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

name: Innervate
text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Hex
text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?

name: Mortal Coil
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

name: Murloc Tidehunter
text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Murloc Scout.
flavor: "Death will rise, from the tides!"

name: Chaos Strike
text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn. Draw a card.
flavor:
"What do we want?" "CHAOS!"
 "When do we want it?"
 "WHEN LEAST EXPECTED!"

name: Elven Archer
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavor: Don't bother asking her out on a date. She'll shoot you down.

name: Psychic Conjurer
text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
flavor: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"

name: Battlefiend
text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: Say what you like about my hatchet-headed hooligan, he’s my battle-friend.

name: Raging Felscreamer
text: Battlecry: The next Demon you play costs (2) less.
flavor: Screaming loudly will not reduce the cost of non-demonic goods.

name: Power of the Wild
text: Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther.
flavor: Never look a panther in the eye. Or is it 'Always look a panther in the eye'? Well, it's one of those.

name: Explosive Trap
text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal $2 damage to all enemies.
flavor: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

name: Freezing Trap
text: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand. It costs (2) more.
flavor: "Dang, that's cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

name: Deadly Shot
text: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Our ballista operator is effective, but not picky.

name: Counterspell
text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't? The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Ice Barrier
text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor.
flavor: This is Rank 1. Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

name: Argent Protector
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavor: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs. I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."

name: Tirion Fordring
text: Divine Shield, Taunt Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
flavor: If you haven't heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it's because it doesn't exist.

name: Equality
text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
flavor: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

name: Shadow Word: Ruin
text: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.
flavor: Discovered by a worgen priest after a giant spilled a drink on her new white robes.

name: Natalie Seline
text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion and gain its Health.
flavor: She discovered Xal'atath, Blade of the Black Empire, a terrible weapon of shadow magic that could both swallow a soul and cut a mean julienne.

name: SI:7 Agent
text: Combo: Deal 3 damage.
flavor: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities. Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

name: Shadowstep
text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance. Crowds love it.

name: Preparation
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

name: Lightning Bolt
text: Deal $3 damage. Overload: (1)
flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

name: Feral Spirit
text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (1)
flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

name: Earth Elemental
text: Taunt Overload: (2)
flavor: Nothing beats rock.

name: Lightning Storm
text: Deal $3 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

name: Al'Akir the Windlord
text: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords. And the other three don't let him forget it.

name: Siphon Soul
text: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to your hero.
flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul. You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

name: Flame Imp
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavor: Imps like being on fire. They just do.

name: Lord Jaraxxus
text: Battlecry: Equip a 3/8 Blood Fury.
flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

name: Slam
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.

name: Brawl
text: Destroy all minions except one. (chosen randomly)
flavor: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

name: Shield Slam
text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

name: Grommash Hellscream
text: Charge Has +6 Attack while damaged.
flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes! Maybe not his best decision.

name: Frothing Berserker
text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

name: Abusive Sergeant
text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
flavor: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

name: Big Game Hunter
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 7 or more Attack.
flavor: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him. Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

name: Worgen Infiltrator
text: Stealth
flavor: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

name: Bloodmage Thalnos
text: Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: He's in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

name: King Mukla
text: Battlecry: Give your opponent 2 Bananas.
flavor: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

name: Stranglethorn Tiger
text: Stealth
flavor: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

name: Youthful Brewmaster
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavor: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews. Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

name: Crazed Alchemist
text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
flavor: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.

name: Mad Bomber
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split between all other characters.
flavor: He's not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

name: Loot Hoarder
text: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: Always roll need.

name: Coldlight Seer
text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs +2 Health.
flavor: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths. So no, there's no getting away from murlocs.

name: Cairne Bloodhoof
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Baine Bloodhoof.
flavor: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don't put this guy in a Warrior deck. It's pretty insensitive.

name: Dire Wolf Alpha
text: Adjacent minions have +1 Attack.
flavor: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

name: Murloc Tidecaller
text: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
flavor: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

name: Bloodsail Raider
text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.
flavor: "I only plunder on days that end in 'y'."

name: Southsea Captain
text: Your other Pirates have +1/+1.
flavor: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat. He has hat envy.

name: Crimson Sigil Runner
text: Outcast: Draw a card.
flavor: He's not the fastest of the bunch, but he'll take a stab at it anyway.

name: Spectral Sight
text: [x]Draw a card. Outcast: Draw another.
flavor: "Pick a card, any card! Preferably the left- or right-most card."

name: Feral Rage
text: Choose One - Give your hero +4 Attack this turn; or Gain 8 Armor.
flavor: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.

name: Quick Shot
text:
Deal $3 damage.
If your hand is empty, draw a card.
flavor: Han shot first.

name: Righteous Protector
text: Taunt Divine Shield
flavor: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.

name: Flash Heal
text: Restore #5 Health.
flavor: Flash! Ahhhhhhh~

name: Nerubian Egg
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Nerubian.
flavor: Eggs are a good source of protein and Nerubians.

name: Annoy-o-Tron
text: Taunt Divine Shield
flavor: The inventor of the Annoy-o-Tron was immediately expelled from Tinkerschool, Tinkertown, and was eventually exiled from the Eastern Kingdoms altogether.

name: Sleepy Dragon
text: Taunt
flavor: Local villagers call her "Naps Under the Mountain."

name: Menacing Nimbus
text: Battlecry: Add a random Elemental to your hand.
flavor: Electra stores her elementals in the cloud.

name: Drain Soul
text: Lifesteal Deal $3 damage to a minion.
flavor: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

name: Eye Beam
text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. Outcast: This costs (1).
flavor: Sometimes looks CAN kill.

name: Swashburglar
text: Battlecry: Add a random card from another class to your hand.
flavor: Was almost named "Swashb-AAAARRHHH-gler"

name: Redgill Razorjaw
text: Rush
flavor: One fish, two fish, red fish replaces blue fish.

name: Murloc Warleader
text: Your other Murlocs have +2 Attack.
flavor: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound? Nope! Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

name: Kalecgos
text: Your first spell each turn costs (0). Battlecry: Discover a spell.
flavor: He was once the Aspect of Magic but gave it up to focus on cheap tricks.

name: Blizzard
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
flavor: This spell can be very Entertaining.

name: Fandral Staghelm
text: Your Choose One cards and powers have both effects combined.
flavor: Always manages to mention "Back when I was creating the World Tree…" in EVERY conversation. Sheesh! Enough already.

name: Wrath
text: Choose One - Deal $3 damage to a minion; or $1 damage and draw a card.
flavor: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

name: Living Roots
text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

name: Far Sight
text: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

name: Flametongue Totem
text: Adjacent minions have +2 Attack.
flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems. There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

name: Animal Companion
text: Summon a random Beast Companion.
flavor: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer! Huffer is more trouble than he's worth.

name: Shield Block
text:
Gain 5 Armor.
Draw a card.
flavor: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

name: Bloodhoof Brave
text: Taunt Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavor: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it. He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.

name: Bash
text:
Deal $3 damage.
Gain 3 Armor.
flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice. It doesn't.

name: Flash of Light
text:
Restore #4 Health.
Draw a card.
flavor: Hey! No cameras allowed!

name: Acolyte of Pain
text: Whenever this minion takes damage, draw a card.
flavor: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

name: Doomsayer
text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
flavor: He's almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

name: Beaming Sidekick
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
flavor: Sure, I'll carry the water! And the food! And the tents! And the cursed monkey paw!

name: Tar Creeper
text: Taunt Has +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
flavor: If you won't come to the tar pits, we'll bring them to you!

name: Lifedrinker
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero. Restore #3 Health to your hero.
flavor: In a pinch, he'll also settle for Holy Water: Zero.

name: Wild Pyromancer
text: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
flavor: BOOM BABY BOOM! BAD IS GOOD! DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

name: Plated Beetle
text: Deathrattle: Gain 3 Armor.
flavor: "Ok, your party has defeated the beetle." "I put it on my head." "What?" "I put it on my head. Like a hat."

name: Twilight Drake
text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
flavor: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy. And Tacos.

name: Primordial Drake
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavor: Before he became a rap artist.

name: Faerie Dragon
text: Elusive
flavor: Adorable. Immune to Magic. Doesn't pee on the rug. The perfect pet!

name: Death Strike
text: Lifesteal Deal $6 damage to a minion.
flavor: A little embarrassing when used on large minions.

name: Frost Strike
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, Discover a Frost Rune card.
flavor: Anyone up for some frost bowling?

name: Anti-Magic Shell
text: Give your minions +1/+1 and Elusive.
flavor: Using a spell to counter magic - a bit hypocritical don't you think?

name: Army of the Dead
text: Raise up to 5 Corpses as 2/2 Risen Ghouls with Rush.
flavor: Yesterday's army, today.

name: Battlefield Necromancer
text: [x]At the end of your turn, raise a Corpse as a 1/3 Risen Footman with Taunt.
flavor: Coming soon: the Hand Necromancer and the Deck Necromancer.

name: Deathbringer Saurfang
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Return this to your hand. It costs Health instead of Mana.
flavor: "In hindsight, maybe I should have let the Alliance have all the fun back at the Wrathgate."

name: Grave Strength
text: [x]Give your minions +1 Attack. Spend 5 Corpses to give them +3 instead.
flavor: They're just standing there… MENACINGLY!

name: Chillfallen Baron
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavor: He hates when people call 60 degree weather cold.

name: Remorseless Winter
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies. Draw a card.
flavor: In the Badlands, this is a Rare.

name: Body Bagger
text: Battlecry: Gain a Corpse.
flavor: Gotta get that bag.

name: Gnome Muncher
text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal At the end of your turn, attack the lowest Health enemy.
flavor: Gnom gnom gnom.

name: Harbinger of Winter
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Frost spell.
flavor: Winter: it be comin'.

name: Stitched Giant
text: [x]Costs (1) less for each Corpse you've spent this game.
flavor: Sew big or go home!

name: Skeletal Sidekick
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Undead +2 Attack.
flavor: He's got your back. And your arm.

name: Explosive Runes
text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $6 damage to it and any excess to their hero.
flavor: Sometimes it's safer NOT to read the warning signs.

name: Lightbomb
text: Deal damage to each minion equal to its Attack.
flavor: This is what happens when you allow goblins to be priests.

name: Tess Greymane
text: [x]Battlecry: Replay every card from another class you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Those who cannot remember their card history are doomed to repeat it.

name: Hench-Clan Burglar
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell from another class.
flavor: She’s more of a rat burglar.

name: Bronze Explorer
text: Lifesteal Battlecry: Discover a Dragon.
flavor: Always ready to explore new friendships! Except with Deathwing.

name: Gorillabot A-3
text: Battlecry: If you control another Mech, Discover a Mech.
flavor: A-1 and A-2 went nuts, when they should have gone bolts.

name: Vulpera Scoundrel
text: Battlecry: Discover a spell or pick a mystery choice.
flavor: A spell is a spell, but the mystery choice could be anything! (It's also a spell.)

name: Injured Tol'vir
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to this minion.
flavor: Me-OW!

name: Thassarian
text: Reborn Battlecry and Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: A natural born leader. And an unnatural reborn leader.

name: Krag'wa, the Frog
text: Battlecry: Return all spells you played last turn to your hand.
flavor: Krag'wa has a ritual to honor his friends and a ritual to devour his enemies. No one can tell them apart.

name: Despicable Dreadlord
text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: He's deathspicable.

name: Obsidian Statue
text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal Deathrattle: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: The original artist spent many hours with a fine chisel perfecting the facial expression for maximum tauntiness.

name: Shadow Ascendant
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
give another random
friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: When you're at the bottom, there's nowhere to ascend, but up.

name: Muster for Battle
text: Summon three 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits. Equip a 1/4 Weapon.
flavor: "I'm bringing the guacamole!" – One of the most successful (yet rare) Silver Hand rallying cries

name: Crusader Aura
text: Whenever a friendly minion attacks, give it +2/+1. Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Also makes your animations 20% faster.

name: Heavy Plate
text: Tradeable Gain 8 Armor.
flavor: "You asked for unbendable, unwavering armor–I don't see why you're upset."

name: Hench-Clan Thug
text: After your hero attacks, give this minion +1/+1.
flavor: Hard time making ends meet? Hate the League of Explorers? Get a job henching!

name: Enhanced Dreadlord
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Dreadlord with Lifesteal.
flavor: Photo actually taken across the street in the reflection of a doorknob.

name: Arcane Artificer
text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain Armor equal to its Cost.
flavor: Ethereal armor dissipates in 6 hours which can cause extreme awkwardness for first time buyers.

name: Firelands Portal
text:
Deal $6 damage. Summon a random
6-Cost minion.
flavor: Come to beautiful Firelands! Where it's "Way nicer than the Abyssal Maw!"

name: Jeweled Macaw
text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
flavor: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

name: Illidari Studies
text: Discover an Outcast card. Your next one costs (1) less.
flavor: "Don't read texts and drive."

name: Immolation Aura
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions twice.
flavor: If you can't take the heat, stop standing in the fire.

name: Resistance Aura
text:
Your opponent's
spells cost (1) more.
Lasts 2 enemy turns.
flavor: Perfect for defending against Beasts. Specifically small ones. Like, a very specific species of small insectoid animal. Ants. It resists ants.

name: Kayn Sunfury
text: Charge All friendly attacks ignore Taunt.
flavor: "Armor and heals may slow my zeal, but fel and glaives excite me!"

name: Witchwood Apple
text: Add two 2/2 Treants to your hand.
flavor: An apple a day keeps the worgen at bay.

name: Flame Geyser
text:
Deal $2 damage.
Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
flavor: Oh, a wise geyser eh?

name: Grimestreet Outfitter
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand +1/+1.
flavor: If you bargain hard, he'll throw in the hat.

name: Hand of A'dal
text:
Give a minion +2/+1.
Draw a card.
flavor: When it meets the Hand of Gul'dan, they're SHAKING.

name: Eviscerate
text: Deal $2 damage. Combo: Deal $4 damage instead.
flavor: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent. You might tweak your elbow! That really hurts!

name: Spirit Bomb
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion and your hero.
flavor: Might take a few episodes to power up.

name: The Black Knight
text: Tradeable Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
flavor: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament. We can pretty much mark that a failure.

name: Rustrot Viper
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
flavor: Poisonous to weapons.

name: Royal Librarian
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavor: Books on how to flip the Auction House are down that way.

name: Cult Neophyte
text: Battlecry: Your opponent's spells cost (1) more next turn.
flavor: Make a new recruit's deficiencies your efficiencies.

name: Dirty Rat
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Your opponent summons a random minion from their hand.
flavor: It's not his fault… Someone keeps stealing his soap!

name: Glacial Shard
text: Battlecry: Freeze an enemy.
flavor: Ice, ice, baby!

name: Murmy
text: Reborn
flavor: Unlike other mummies, they rolled him up with rice, sliced cucumbers, and soy sauce on the side.

name: Dread Corsair
text: Taunt Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
flavor: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

name: Ragnaros the Firelord
text: Can't attack. At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord. Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

name: Tar Slime
text: Taunt Has +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
flavor: Too cute to be contained!

name: Scarab Keychain
text: Battlecry: Discover a 2-Cost card.
flavor: "How do you keep losing your keys!? They couldn't have just gotten up and walked away!"

name: Part Scrapper
text:
Lose up to 5 Armor.
Your next Mech costs
that much less.
flavor: "Goodbye! Goodbye! Goodbye!"

name: Spirit of the Team
text: Stealth for 1 turn. Your hero has +2 Attack on your turn.
flavor: Horrible call! BOOOOoo00oO0o0OO0oo0oO!

name: Botface
text: [x]Taunt After this takes damage, get two random Minis.
flavor: "NOBODY CALLS ME BOTFACE!!" -Botface

name: Safety Goggles
text:
Gain 6 Armor.
Costs (0) if you don't
have any Armor.
flavor:
Remember, always be safe in the lab to mitigate injuries!
*painfully snaps goggles onto face*

name: Fireworker
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Boom Bots. WARNING: Bots may explode.
flavor: The one job where a spark of creativity is unwanted.

name: Hidden Objects
text: Discover a Secret. Set its Cost to (1).
flavor: There are 99 gnomes in this picture. Can YOU find them all?

name: Incredible Value
text: Discover a 4-Cost minion. Set its Attack and Health to 7.
flavor: Now with expedited Overload!

name: Card Grader
text: Battlecry: If you've cast a spell while holding this, Discover a card from your deck.
flavor: "Uncentered gem, fractured frame, folded corner... 10/10!"

name: Fan of Knives
text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw a card.
flavor: I wouldn't say I LOVE knives, but I'm definitely a fan.

name: Sweetened Snowflurry
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Get 2 random Temporary Frost spells.
flavor: "You want a piece of me!? Will that be one scoop or two?"

name: Hammer of Wrath
text:
Deal $3 damage.
Draw a card.
flavor: A good paladin has many tools. Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

name: Nostalgic Gnome
text: [x]Miniaturize Rush. After this minion deals exact lethal damage on your turn, draw a card.
flavor: She remembers Alterac Valley like it was 833 days ago.

name: Zilliax Deluxe 3000
text:
While building your deck,
customize your very own
Zilliax Deluxe 3000!
flavor: It only took us 2998 prototypes to figure out how to make the perfect card... by having YOU do it!

name: Baking Soda Volcano
text: Lifesteal. Deal $10 damage randomly split among all minions. Overload: (1)
flavor: Science rules.

name: Shudderblock
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Your next Battlecry triggers 3 times, but can't damage the enemy hero.
flavor: Beware the hinges that pinch, the scales that splinter!

name: Shining Sentinel
text: Taunt, Elusive Battlecry: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: OMG, I FINALLY GOT A SHINING SENTINEL AFTER 3 PHASES AND 8192 RESETS!!!!!

name: Hagatha the Fabled
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw 2 spells that cost (5) or more. Transform them into Slimes that cast the spells.
flavor: Soup's on!

name: Painted Canvasaur
text: Battlecry: Give each other friendly Beast a random Bonus Effect.
flavor: Oh this is a present? Would you like that gift raptor not?

name: Mystery Egg
text: [x]Miniaturize Deathrattle: Get a copy of a random Beast in your deck. It costs (3) less.
flavor: Which came first, the Mukla or the egg?

name: Fetch!
text: Draw a minion. If it's a Beast, draw a spell.
flavor: We made fetch happen.

name: Patchwork Pals
text:
Get all 3 Animal Companions. They
cost (1) less.
flavor: "I'll name you Misha, you Huffer, and you can be the third one."

name: R.C. Rampage
text: Summon six 1/1 Hounds. Any that can't fit give the others +1/+1.
flavor: This place has really gone to the dogs.

name: Hemet, Foam Marksman
text: After a friendly Beast dies, get a random Legendary Beast from the past. It costs (2) less.
flavor: So THIS is who's been lowering the power level of all those Hearthstone cards in a foamly fashion.

name: Toyrannosaurus
text: Rush Deathrattle: Deal 7 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: This toy WRECKS.

name: Toy Boat
text: After you summon a Pirate, draw a card.
flavor: Try playing seven of these in one turn fast.

name: King Plush
text: [x]Battlecry: If your opponent has 15 or less health, return all other minions to their owner's decks and gain Charge.
flavor: He's so fluffy you're gonna DIE!

name: Remote Control
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Hound.
flavor: For some reason, my dog keeps trying to eat this.

name: Ci'Cigi
text: [x]Battlecry, Outcast, and Deathrattle: Get a random first-edition Demon Hunter card (in mint condition).
flavor: She once bought a 1of1 Golden Skull of Gul'dan written entirely in Thalassian for 2,000,000 Gold.

name: Jungle Gym
text:
[x]Deal 1 damage to a
random enemy. Repeat
for each friendly Beast.
flavor: Yeah, I work out at the gym. The one with all the plushies and toys.

name: Triplewick Trickster
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy, three times.
flavor: You no take candle! Or second candle. You can take third candle though.

name: Manufacturing Error
text: Draw 3 cards. If your deck has no minions, they cost (3) less.
flavor: You thought the 9-piece puzzle would be easy, didn't you?

name: Yogg in the Box
text: Cast 5 random spells. If your deck has no minions, the spells cast cost (5) or more.
flavor: POP! Goes the Old God!

name: Nostalgic Initiate
text: Miniaturize The first time you cast a spell, gain +2/+2.
flavor:
Nostalgic Initiate: "Man I wish I could relive my college days..."
Kel'thuzad: "Say no more."

name: Once Upon a Time...
text:
Summon a random
3-Cost Beast, Dragon,
Elemental, and Murloc.
flavor: ...There was a humble little squirrel on a quest to defeat an evil dragon. With the help of its earthen friend, it saved the murloc princess from danger. The end.

name: Fairy Tale Forest
text: [x]Draw a Battlecry minion. It costs (1) less.
flavor: Man, I wish fairy tales were real, Durg'tash the Sorcerer.

name: Nostalgic Clown
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: If you've played a higher Cost card while holding this, deal 4 damage.
flavor: He used to be kind of corrupt, but now he performs purely for the fun of it.

name: Pop-Up Book
text: Deal $2 damage. Summon two 0/1 Frogs with Taunt.
flavor: What's up-book?

name: Wind-Up Musician
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. (Trade to upgrade!)
flavor: Sure to wind up your opponents.

name: Dig for Treasure
text: Draw a minion. If it's a Pirate, get a Coin.
flavor: "Woohoo! I'm so glad I dug up a pirate!"

name: Shoplifter Goldbeard
text:
[x]After you summon a
Pirate, summon a copy of
it that attacks a random
enemy, then dies.
flavor: "Arr, this plunder be great for Cap'n Fourteeth's baby shower!"

name: The Crystal Cove
text:
[x]The next minion you
summon this turn has
its stats set to 4/4.
flavor: For some strange reason, everyone that hangs out at the Crystal Cove has the same name...

name: Spot the Difference
text: Discover a 3-Cost minion to summon. If your deck has no minions, repeat this.
flavor: Ah, I see now! One of them is a picture of a Chillwind Yeti, and the other is a Blood Elf.

name: Sleet Skater
text: Miniaturize Battlecry: Freeze an enemy minion. Gain Armor equal to its Attack.
flavor: How do you do, fellow Ice Elementals?

name: Watercolor Artist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Frost spell. At the start of your turns, reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: They've amassed a largely aquatic body of work, painting lakes, rivers and self portraits.

name: Frost Lich Cross-Stitch
text: Deal $3 damage to a character. If it dies, summon a 3/6 Water Elemental that Freezes.
flavor: Do not fear power... Fear those who SEW IT!

name: The Galactic Projection Orb
text: Recast a random spell of each Cost you've cast this game (targets enemies if possible).
flavor: Look closely in the ball and you'll see the expansion of space and time itself. Or their projections, anyway.

name: Sand Art Elemental
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Give your hero +1 Attack and Windfury this turn.
flavor: This art HURT ME!!!

name: Factory Assemblybot
text: Miniaturize At the end of your turn, summon a 6/7 Bot that attacks a random enemy.
flavor: I call it Mini-me.

name: Thistle Tea Set
text: Discover a spell from another class. Get a copy of it.
flavor: Available with Swiftthistle or Decafthistle.

name: Sonya Waterdancer
text: After you play a 1-Cost minion, get a copy of it that costs (0).
flavor: Water you dancing to?

name: Chemical Spill
text:
Summon the highest Cost minion
from your hand, then
deal $5 damage to it.
flavor: I said spill the TEA, not the acid!

name: Wreck'em and Deck'em
text:
[x]Choose a friendly Mech.
Summon a copy of it
that attacks a random
enemy, then dies.
flavor: ...and Check'em for any signs of life.

name: Quality Assurance
text: Draw 2 Taunt minions.
flavor: I assure you this card is quality.

name: Testing Dummy
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 8 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Don't worry, they're having a blast. MUAHAHAHAHAAAA!

name: Inventor Boom
text: [x]Battlecry: Resurrect two different friendly Mechs that cost (5) or more. They attack random enemies.
flavor: The best part of inventing stuff is blowing it up!

name: Boom Wrench
text: [x]Miniaturize Deathrattle: Trigger the Deathrattle of a random friendly Mech.
flavor:
Boom, the Inventor; Can he fix it?
Boom, the Inventor; No he can't!

name: Lab Patron
text: [x]Whenever you gain Armor, summon another Lab Patron (once per turn).
flavor: When a Lab Patron fails out of school, they become a Grim Patron.

name: Bargain Bin Buccaneer
text: Rush Combo: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: Thrift stores have the best buccaneers.

name: Clay Matriarch
text: [x]Miniaturize Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon a 4/4 Whelp with Elusive.
flavor: I hope you didn't need all that purple clay.

name: Papercraft Angel
text: Your Hero Power costs (0).
flavor: Warcraft. StarCraft. And now, Papercraft!

name: Careless Crafter
text: Deathrattle: Get two 0-Cost Bandages that restore 3 Health.
flavor: How about YOU try folding paper with only three fingers!?

name: Raza the Resealed
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle copies of 5 random friendly minions that died this game into your deck. They cost (0).
flavor: The 10th anniversary edition of a classic bestseller!

name: Clearance Promoter
text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of two spells in your hand by (1).
flavor: "Sorry, we just sold our last Worgen Greaser figure."

name: Caricature Artist
text: Battlecry: Draw a minion that costs (5) or more. Give it a funny mustache!
flavor: "Pfffft…. You look RIDICULOUS! And I haven't even drawn the mustache yet!"

name: Timewinder Zarimi
text: [x]Battlecry: Once per game, if you've played 8 other Dragons, take an extra turn.
flavor: With how generous Whizbang's return policy is, Zarimi has never been busier.

name: Giftwrapped Whelp
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, give it and this minion +1/+1.
flavor: Don't forget to poke fire-breathing holes in the box!

name: Scale Replica
text: Draw your lowest and highest Cost Dragon.
flavor: Get it!?! It's because dragons have hides - commonly known as scales - and this is a model of a dragon on a smaller level, also known as a scale. IT'S THE SAME WORD!

name: Plucky Paintfin
text: [x]Poisonous Battlecry: Draw a Rush minion.
flavor: Not everyone can become a great painter. But a great painter can come from anywhere.

name: Treasure Distributor
text: After you summon a Pirate, give it +1 Attack.
flavor: As the illiterate pirates always say: There is no 'I' in 'piracy'.

name: Observer of Mysteries
text: Battlecry: Cast 2 random Secrets. At the start of your turn, destroy them.
flavor: Nobody tell him, but he still has his Secrets set to the "Try Me" mode.

name: Chalk Artist
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a minion. Transform it into a random Legendary one (keeping its original stats and Cost).
flavor: Well it's either a dragon or a dinosaur - chalk it up to art style.

name: Sandbox Scoundrel
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Your next card this turn costs (3) less.
flavor: "Really? A bunch of fake plastic gems AGAIN!?"

name: Watercannon
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 1/1 Pirate that attacks a random enemy.
flavor: There's a teeny tiny pirate trapped in each of the water balloons. Free them!

name: Forgotten Animatronic
text: At the end of your turn, destroy a minion with less Attack than this.
flavor: He ALWAYS comes back.

name: Crafter's Aura
text:
At the end of your turn, summon a random 6-Cost minion.
Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: She has at LEAST Craftsmanship +3.

name: Cardboard Golem
text: Battlecry: Increase the duration of Auras in your hand, deck, and battlefield by 1.
flavor: It's certainly... creative.

name: Bucket of Soldiers
text: Deathrattle: Summon five 1/1 Soldiers with random Bonus Effects.
flavor: Life is like a bucket of soldiers. You never know what bonus effects you're gonna get.

name: Painter's Virtue
text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
give minions in your
hand +1/+1.
flavor: For when the Light hits the painting at a certain angle.

name: Tigress Plushy
text: Miniaturize Rush, Lifesteal, Divine Shield
flavor: The sheervalue of this card is undeniable.

name: Pipsi Painthoof
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random Divine Shield, Rush, and Taunt minion from your deck.
flavor: "Earthmother guide my paintbrush strokes, especially on the eyes."

name: Toy Captain Tarim
text: [x]Miniaturize Taunt. Battlecry: Set a minion's Attack and Health to this minion's.
flavor: Whizbang is now the sole proprietor of Un'Goro.

name: Workshop Mishap
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion. Excess damages both neighbors. Outcast: Gain Lifesteal.
flavor: IT HAS BEEN [0] DAYS SINCE LAST ACCIDENT.

name: Umpire's Grasp
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Demon and reduce its Cost by (2).
flavor: PENALTY - FEL BALL!

name: Ball Hog
text: [x]Lifesteal Battlecry and Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the lowest Health enemy.
flavor: "There's no hog in team... ANYMORE! I QUIT!"

name: Blind Box
text: Get 2 random Demons. Outcast: Discover them instead.
flavor: THREE Flame Imps?? C'mon, where's my pity timer?!

name: Red Card
text: Make a minion go Dormant for 2 turns.
flavor: Finally, Demon Hunter has expanded its color palette to TWO colors!

name: Lesser Opal Spellstone
text: Draw 1 card. (Attack with your hero 2 times to upgrade.)
flavor:
For those seeking glory and power
Be not swayed by Azari the Devourer
The opal grants victory to the weak
But leaves your soul barren and bleak

name: Messmaker
text: Lifesteal, Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all enemies.
flavor: The most painful 1 damage of your life.

name: Magtheridon, Unreleased
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, deal 3 damage to all enemies at the end of your turn.
flavor: Playing with this card can be penalized with up to a two-year suspension. Please wait until the card is officially released.

name: Sparkling Phial
text:
[x]Deal $2 damage.
Your next card this turn
costs that much less.
flavor: Lemme pull up your phial.

name: Chia Drake
text: Miniaturize Choose One - Gain Spell Damage +1; or Draw a spell.
flavor: Huh-huh-huh Hearthstone!

name: Wind-Up Sapling
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Refresh 1 Mana Crystals. (Trade to upgrade!)
flavor: I am Wind-Up Sapling.

name: Magical Dollhouse
text: [x]Gain Spell Damage +1 this turn only.
flavor:
Build your own dollhouse in 3 easy steps!
1. Build a castle.
2. Miniaturize it.
3. GLITTER!

name: Jade Display
text: [x]Deathrattle: Your Jade Displays have +1/+1 this game. Shuffle 2 of them into your deck.
flavor: The Jade Lotus just releases the same product every year but with an upgraded camera.

name: Woodland Wonders
text: Summon two 2/5 Beetles with Taunt. Costs (3) less if you have Spell Damage.
flavor: Is this a standup fight or another bug hunt?

name: Ensmallen
text: Reduce the Cost and Attack of minions in your deck by (1).
flavor: Come on, you know- I ensmallen, you ensmallen? He she me Ensmallen? Ensmallogy: the study of ensmallening?! IT'S FIRST GRADE.

name: Sky Mother Aviana
text: [x]Battlecry: Shuffle 10 random Legendary minions into your deck. They cost (1).
flavor: It's a bird! It's a plane! It's 10 copies of Leeroy Jenkins!

name: Owlonius
text: [x]Spell Damage +1 Your spells get double bonus from Spell Damage.
flavor: They said you sound like an owl.

name: Silk Stitching
text: Choose a friendly minion. Discover a spell that costs (4) or less for it to cast when it dies.
flavor: The slogan of their very exclusive sewing club is "You can't stitch with us."

name: Rainbow Seamstress
text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck started with a Blood, Frost, or Unholy card, gain Lifesteal, Reborn, or Rush respectively.
flavor: Is this card any good? It would seam sew.

name: Darkthorn Quilter
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
deal this minion's Attack
damage randomly split
 among enemies.
flavor: Still mad about not being let into the spiders' sewing club.

name: Threads of Despair
text: Give all minions "Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all minions."
flavor: Mom, I frew up...

name: Shambling Zombietank
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Spend 5 Corpses to summon a copy of this.
flavor: Spider Tank in shambles.

name: The Headless Horseman
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy the enemy minion with the most Attack! Shuffle my Head into your deck, you must get it back!
flavor:
This flavor text, you would expect
to rhyme and reference, to great effect!
It starts out strong, but as you can tell
it doesn't end very good.

name: Dr. Stitchensew
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a 5, 3, and 1-Cost minion to stitch to this. Deathrattle: Summon the 5-Cost minion.
flavor: First, do some harm.

name: Window Shopper
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Discover a Demon. Set its stats and Cost to this minion's.
flavor: OMG THAT'S LITERALLY ME!

name: Bottomless Toy Chest
text: Discover a card from your deck. If you have Spell Damage, copy it.
flavor: That's right, it goes in the toy chest.

name: Amateur Puppeteer
text: [x]Miniaturize, Taunt Deathrattle: Give Undead in your hand +2/+2.
flavor: "I'm a real toy!"

name: Wind-Up Enforcer
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Summon 1 copies of this minion. (Trade to upgrade!)
flavor: Code 6404.5 clearly states that all Enforcers remain in their packaging until told by authorized personnel.

name: Splendiferous Whizbang
text:
[x]You start the game
with one of Whizbang's
Experimental Decks!
flavor: After his work at Boomsday Labs, he's taken what Dr. Boom taught him and applied it to the most important inventions of all - TOYS!!!

name: Game Master Nemsy
text: Battlecry: Draw a Demon. Deathrattle: Swap places with it.
flavor: "Rocks fall, and everyone dies. Oopsies!"

name: Domino Effect
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Repeat to the left or right, dealing 1 more damage each time.
flavor: WHY DO THEY NEVER RUN TO THE SIDE?????

name: Wretched Queen
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two 4/6 Knights with Taunt.
flavor: Mind your head when you're around her.

name: Tabletop Roleplayer
text: [x]Miniaturize Battlecry: Give a friendly Demon +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavor: "And then I uh... I curse them with... uh... OH! I got it! They have to speak in rhymes or they turn into a crab!"

name: Sketch Artist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Shadow spell. Get a Temporary copy of it.
flavor: Never ask an artist how many pieces they've finished.

name: Malefic Rook
text: Battlecry: Attack YOUR hero.
flavor: Was a regular Pawn but Fel in with the wrong toys.

name: Cursed Campaign
text: [x]Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon two copies of this minion that are Dormant for 2 turns."
flavor: Their group has been trying to schedule the next session since Kobolds and Catacombs came out.

name: Everything Must Go!
text: Summon two random 4-Cost minions. Costs (1) less for each card you've drawn this turn.
flavor: Go where??

name: Sing-Along Buddy
text:
Your Hero Power
triggers twice.
flavor: One of the buttons makes you sound JUST like Ragnaros. BY FIRE BE HEARD!

name: Fancy Packaging
text: Give a minion with Divine Shield +2/+3.
flavor: Wow, this card is great value! Until you open it.

name: Trinket Artist
text: Battlecry: Draw a Divine Shield minion and an Aura.
flavor: Many Draenei found new hobbies on the long journey from Argus.

name: Wheel of DEATH!!!
text:
Destroy your deck.
In 5 turns, destroy
the enemy hero.
flavor: Why don't the good guys ever get a wheel?

name: Playhouse Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each card you've drawn this game.
flavor: WARNING: NOT A PLAYHOUSE. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO CLIMB.

name: Li'Na, Shop Manager
text:
[x]Whenever you cast a spell,
fill your board with random
minions of that Cost.
flavor: Somebody has to do the paperwork around here.

name: Rambunctious Stuffy
text: Rush After you cast a Frost spell, gain Reborn.
flavor: The Lich King can't sleep without his stuffy.

name: Table Flip
text:
Deal $3 damage to all enemy minions.
Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavor: "Judge!"

name: Crane Game
text: Summon copies of two Demons in your deck.
flavor: This claw machine is RIGGED! I keep getting demons that bite me!

name: Corridor Sleeper
text: Starts Dormant. After 7 minions die, awaken.
flavor:
In the workshop, I go deeper.
In the mulligan, I'm a keeper.
This time, I'm even cheaper.
You guessed it right, I'm Corridor Sleeper.

name: Giggling Toymaker
text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/2 Mechs with Taunt and Divine Shield.
flavor: "HAHAhehehe. Hahaha he." -Me when I'm making toys

name: Dubious Purchase
text: Draw 3 cards. Combo: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavor: Beauty is in the eye of the scorpidholder.

name: Gibbering Reject
text: After your hero attacks, summon another Gibbering Reject.
flavor: Don't get it wet or feed it after midnight.

name: Product 9
text: Battlecry: Recast every friendly Secret that triggered this game.
flavor: We're fresh out of Toyrantus right now but lemme show you something we have that's just as good!

name: Pro Gamer
text: [x]Battlecry: Challenge your opponent to a game of Rock-Paper-Scissors! The winner draws 2 cards.
flavor: Wow... who could have guessed? Another rock user ruining the meta for everyone as usual.

name: Flickering Lightbot
text: [x]Gigantify Costs (1) less for each Holy spell you've cast this game.
flavor: These bots are sent out with nearly drained batteries, for dramatic effect.

name: Puppet Theatre
text:
[x]Choose an enemy
minion. Get a 1/1 copy
of it that costs (1).
flavor: AUDIENCE PARTICIPATION TIME!

name: Lesser Spinel Spellstone
text: Give Undead in your hand +1/+1. (Gain 5 Corpses to upgrade.)
flavor:
A story concluded, the kobolds had fought
Yet here is a spellstone Azari forgot
Pawned off to shops, considered a trinket
Dark powers contained, none would think it

name: Repackage
text:
Stuff all minions into a 2-Cost Box,
then shuffle it into the opponent's deck.
flavor: I don't want to play with you anymore.

name: Wish Upon a Star
text: Give +2/+3 to all minions in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor:
"What are you going to wish for?"
"I wish I had just a liiiiiiiittle more Attack and Health!"
"...Really? You don't want, like, a million more?"

name: Cosplay Contestant
text: After your opponent plays a minion, transform into a 3/4 copy of it.
flavor: She's the winner of the Valeera Cosplay Contest! Second place was Valeera.

name: Workshop Janitor
text: Battlecry: If you control a location, draw 2 cards.
flavor: She works in a magical toy shop and they just gave her a regular mop? Make it make sense.

name: Nesting Golem
text: Deathrattle: Resummon this with -1/-1.
flavor: NESTING GOLEEEEEEEEEEEEM!!!!!!! Eh… It just doesn't feel the same.

name: Origami Frog
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Swap Attack with another minion.
flavor: For extra-realistic fly-snatching action, use tape!

name: Origami Crane
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Swap Health with another minion.
flavor: I was born with 1-Health and paper skin.

name: Origami Dragon
text: [x]Divine Shield, Lifesteal Battlecry: Swap stats with another minion.
flavor: The fire will give you a papercut, which CAN burn. Does that count?

name: Floppy Hydra
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle a copy of this into your deck with permanently doubled Attack and Health.
flavor: If you cut one of its heads off, it'll grow back twice as cute!

name: Whack-A-Gnoll
text: Discover a Paladin weapon from the past. Give it +1/+1.
flavor: Need closure on your Hardcore WoW character dying in Westfall? Step right up!

name: Wave of Nostalgia
text: Transform ALL minions into random Legendary ones from the past.
flavor: Ja, please don't freeze my minions. No stall, ja????

name: INFERNAL!
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Set your hero's remaining Health to 15.

[x]After your hero
 attacks, summon

name: Interstellar Starslicer

flavor:
The universe is infinite. Ever-expanding, its sheer size is something that even the ancestors of our ancestors can only dream of knowing. And even still, across every single pocket of the galaxy, every one thing is unique.
So, no, we've never made the same flavor-text twice, IDK what you're talking about.

[x]At the end of your

text:
Fill your board
with random 2-Cost minions that attack
random enemies.

"Our mission takes us to the planet of Celes, but I know not of its whereabouts."
"Captain, I saw Celes!"

text: Taunt Divine Shield Lifesteal
flavor: One can never have too many shields.

name: Star Grazer

name: Final Frontier
text: Discover a 10-Cost minion from the past. Set its Cost to (1).

flavor: The temptation of limitless knowledge led some Eredar to join the Burning Legion. In the Sha’tari Draenei, the study of everything lives on.

name: Overzealous Healer

name: Askara
text: Battlecry: The next Draenei you play summons a copy of itself.

name: Spontaneous Combustion

name: Detailed Notes

name: Exarch Naielle

name: Emergency Meeting
text:
[x]Get two 4/4 Crewmates.
Put a random Demon
that costs (3) or less
between them.

name: Lightspeed

name: Foreboding Flame

name: Infernal Stratagem
text:
[x]Give a minion +3/+3.
If it's a Demon, your
next one costs (2) less.

name: Abduction Ray

name: Healthstone

name: Black Hole

name: K'ara, the Dark Star

name: Starscale Constellar

flavor: You'll understand how to best make use of its effect once you connect the dots.

name: Stranded Spaceman
text: [x]Battlecry: The next Draenei you play gains +2 Health and Rush.

name: Galactic Crusader
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Get two random Holy spells. They cost (3) less.

name: Lunar Trailblazer
text: [x]Battlecry: Set the Cost of a random spell in your hand to this minion's Cost.

name: First Contact
text: Summon two random 1-Cost minions. Overload: (1)

name: Eredar Skulker
text: [x]Combo and Spellburst: Gain +2 Attack and Stealth.

name: Lucky Comet

When you wish upon a star, your dreams will take you very far.
When you wish upon a comet, your luck will make your opponent...

name: Divine Star
text:
Deal $3 damage
to a minion. Give a random minion in your hand +3 Health.

name: Archimonde
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon every Demon you played this game that didn't start in your deck.

name: Doommaiden

name: Crystal Welder

name: Astral Vigilant

name: Velen, Leader of the Exiled

flavor: For an exiled dude, he's pretty popular!

name: Orbital Satellite

text: [x]Divine Shield Spellburst: Draw a Draenei.
artist: L. Lullabi & I. Campelo da Silva

name: Frostmourne
text: Deathrattle: Summon every minion killed by this weapon.

name: Asphyxiate
text: Destroy the highest Attack enemy minion.
flavor: I find your abundance of Attack disturbing.

name: Acolyte of Death

name: Soulbreaker

name: Spacerock Collector
text: Battlecry: Your next Combo card costs (1) less.

name: Arkwing Pilot

name: Ingenious Artificer

name: Wayward Sage
text: [x]Outcast: Reduce the Cost of the left and right-most cards in your hand by (1).

name: Swipe

name: Greybough

name: Thickhide Kodo
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Gain 5 Armor.

name: Oaken Summons
text:
Gain 6 Armor.
Summon a minion
from your deck that
costs (4) or less.
flavor: The Guild used oak trees until they all turned to ash.

text: [x]Rush. Whenever this attacks, give your hero +3 Attack this turn.

name: Barak Kodobane
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a 1, 2, and 3-Cost spell.

flavor: I literally watched the Hunter place it down in front of me and I still stepped in it.

name: Rat Trap
text: [x]Secret: After your opponent plays three cards in a turn, summon a 6/6 Rat.
flavor: MISSING: One giant rat. Please return to King Togwaggle.

name: Ball of Spiders

text: Deal $3 damage to a character and Freeze it.

name: Primordial Glyph
text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).

name: Silvermoon Portal
text:
Give a minion +2/+2. Summon a random
2-Cost minion.

text: Give a minion +2/+6 and Taunt. When it dies, summon a Stegodon.

name: Void Shard
text: Lifesteal Deal $4 damage.
flavor: Light's easy. Void's hard.

name: Madame Lazul
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a copy of a card in your opponent's hand.

name: Raiding Party

name: Scrounging Shipwright
text: Battlecry: Get a random Starship Piece from another class.
flavor: Mi Starship es tu Starship.

name: Escape Pod
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Rush.
flavor: You can only have two in your deck because we are confident that the Draenei will never run into any dire situations that would warrant any more!

name: Astrobiologist
text: Battlecry: At the start of your next turn, Discover a spell.

name: Braingill
text: Battlecry: Give your other Murlocs "Deathrattle: Draw a card."

name: Doomguard

name: Demonic Studies
text: Discover a Demon. Your next one costs (1) less.

name: Sanguine Depths
text:
[x]Deal 1 damage to a 
minion and give it 
+2 Attack.

name: Siamat
text: [x]Battlecry: Gain 2 of Rush, Taunt, Divine Shield, or Windfury (your choice).

Shuffle your hand into your deck.

text:
Draw 2 minions.
If this costs (0), give them +2/+1.

text:
Give a minion +3/+3. If this costs (0), return this to your hand
at the end of your turn.
flavor: The sacred texts!!

text: Summon three 3/3 Draenei with Divine Shield. If this costs (0), give them Rush.

name: Supernova

name: Blasteroid

name: Lumia

"What's a world soul?"
"Only the most sophisticated form of life ever protected by Titans. AND it's spherical! SPHERICAL!"

name: Talgath

name: Headhunt
text: Deal $2 damage. Get a 4/4 Crewmate with a random Bonus Effect.

name: Warp Drive
text: Draw 2 cards. If you're building a Starship, they cost (2) less.

name: Saruun

BORN FROM THE HEAT DEATH OF COLLIDING SUPERNOVAS, SARUUN SEEKS TO INCINERATE ALL THAT WHICH REVOLVES AROUND THEM TO MERE ASHES AND STARDUST!!!!
Which is pretty neato!

name: Solar Flare
text: Deal $2 damage to all enemies. Costs (1) less for each Elemental you control.

name: Orbital Moon
text: Give a minion Taunt and Lifesteal. If you played an adjacent card this turn, also give it Reborn.

name: Ethereal Oracle

name: Deep Space Curator

name: Eredar Brute

name: Mutating Lifeform

Who knows how many amazing discoveries are out there!
...
Never mind, I'm going home.

name: Ur'zul Rager

Space rock.
*pew*
Spa ce ro ck.
*pew*
S p a c e r o c k .

name: Space Pirate
text: Deathrattle: Your next weapon costs (1) less.

name: Red Giant

text:
[x]Get a 1/1 Baneling
that explodes. If you
control a Zerg minion,
get another Baneling.

text: [x]Battlecry: Relaunch every Starship that you launched this game.

name: SCV
text: Battlecry: Your next Starship launch costs (2) less.

text:
[x]At the end of your turn, get

text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Zergling.

text: [x]Starship Piece Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion. Also triggers on launch.

name: Boulderfist Ogre

text: Rush Divine Shield Elusive

name: Raven Idol
text: Choose One - Discover a minion; or Discover a spell.

name: Vicious Slitherspear
text:
[x]After you cast a spell,
gain +1 Attack until
your next turn.

name: Ship's Chirurgeon
text: After you summon a minion, give it +1 Health.

name: Cargo Guard
text: At the end of your turn, gain 3 Armor.

name: Chrono Boost

name: Warp Gate
text: Your next Protoss minion costs (3) less.

name: Dark Templar
text: [x]Stealth. Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion. Play another Templar to merge into an Archon!
flavor:
*stab*
*stab*
*stab*
"Hey, where'd my SCVs go?"

name: Photon Cannon
text:
Deal $3 damage.
If this kills a minion, your Protoss minions cost (1) less this game.

name: Artanis
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 3/4 Zealots with Charge. Your Protoss minions cost (2) less this game.

name: Construct Pylons
text: Your next Protoss card this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: You must... y'know...

name: Carrier
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
summon four 4/1
Interceptors that attack
random enemies.
flavor: Yeah, my teammates always call me this.

name: Hallucination
text:
Summon a copy of a
friendly Protoss minion.
It takes double damage.
flavor: "Protoss? In our base? I think you're seeing things."

name: Colossus
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemies, twice. (Improved by Protoss spells you cast this game!)
flavor: How's the weather up there?

name: Shield Battery
text:
Gain 6 Armor.
Your next Protoss spell costs (2) less.
flavor: Hey Artanis, can I use your charger?

name: Resonance Coil
text: Deal $5 damage to a minion. Get a random Protoss spell.
flavor: This thing can snipe minions three screens away!

name: Blink
text: [x]Draw a Protoss minion. Combo: It costs (2) less.

name: Mothership
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry and Deathrattle: Get two random Protoss minions.
flavor: You talk to your mothership with that mouth!?

name: Missile Pod
text: [x]Starship Piece Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Also triggers on launch.

name: Lift Off

flavor: It's a bird! It's a plane! It's a burning command center slowly moving to the corner of the map!

name: Concussive Shells
text: Deal $2 damage and gain 2 Armor. Your next Starship launch costs (2) less.

name: Grunty
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon four random Murlocs, then shoot them at enemy minions. (You pick the targets!)

name: Ysera, Emerald Aspect
text: [x]Start of Game: Increase both players'maximum Mana by 5. Battlecry: Gain 3 Mana Crystals.
flavor: She was previously Yuhsera, with a ‘yuh’.

name: Hopeful Dryad
text: Battlecry: Get a random Dream card.
flavor: "I hope this dragon doesn't eat me when it grows up."

name: Verdant Dreamsaber
text: Battlecry: If this costs (3) or less, attack two random enemy minions.
flavor: Hey, at least the card frame is verdant.

name: Ohn'ahra
text: At the end of your turn, play the top 3 cards from your deck.
flavor: Revered by the tauren and centaur, Ohn’ahra’s power over wind remains an inspiration to many.

name: Shepherd's Crook
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 3/3 Sheep that's Dormant for 2 turns.

name: Nydus Worm
text: Draw two Zerg cards. They cost (1) less.
flavor: How did they fit an ultralisk in there!?

name: Forest Lord Cenarius
text: [x]Choose Thrice - Give your other minions +1/+3; or Summon a 5/5 Ancient with Taunt.
flavor: He handpicked Malfurion, and not Illidan, to become the first druid, therefore ensuring an endless cycle of sibling rivalry.

name: Omen
text: [x]Rush, Windfury Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. (Improves after this attacks!)
flavor: His tremendous wisdom could not survive the foul influence of the demons’ fel magic during the War of the Ancients. But his blessing from Elune did.

name: Viper
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a minion from your opponent's hand. Your other Zerg minions gain Reborn and attack it.
flavor: No viping!

name: Ultralisk Cavern
text: [x]Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Deathrattle: Summon an 8/8 Ultralisk with Rush.
flavor: Don't let your ultralisk get stuck on a ramp.

name: Consume
text:
[x]Remove 1 Durability
from a friendly location
to restore #8 Health to
your hero.
flavor: What are you looking at? This isn't a mukbang.

name: Evolution Chamber
text: Give your minions +1 Attack. Give your Zerg an extra +1/+1.

name: Mutalisk
text: [x]Also damages minions next to whomever this attacks (and the enemy hero if a neighbor is missing).
flavor: A flock of seagulls. A murder of crows. A ball of mutalisks.

name: Spine Crawler
text: [x]Taunt. Can't attack. Has +3 Attack if you control a location.
flavor:
Give him one second, he's rooting!
...
