flavor: Under Fyrakk's assault, even those with the purest devotion to nature shall burn.

name: Dragon Turtle
text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with a Dark Gift, give your hero +3 Attack this turn and 6 Armor.
flavor: If you thought evil turtles that live in lava are cool, this one's also a DRAGON!

name: Fyrakk the Blazing
text: [x]Immune to Fire spells. Battlecry: Cast 20 Mana worth of Fire spells at random enemies.
flavor: Originally devoted to snuffing out the Titans' influence, Shadowflame has twisted Fyrakk's mind into an abyss of malice. His Dreamrender now only hungers for a world of embers.

name: Tindral Sageswift
text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. If it's your opponent's turn, deal 4 damage instead.
flavor: He'll have you burning red.

name: Searing Reflection
text: Draw a minion. Summon an 8/8 copy of it with Divine Shield.
flavor: You never would've guessed it, but Ancients love doing the Hot Embers Challenge.

name: Merry Moonkin
text: [x]At the end of your turn, gain 1 Armor. (Improved by Wisps you control!)
flavor: Merry Wispmas!

name: Grove Shaper
text: [x]After you cast a Nature spell, summon a 2/2 Treant with "Deathrattle: Get a copy of that spell."
flavor: Infinite Nature spell glitch.

name: Starsurge
text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. (Improved by each friendly minion that died this game.)
flavor: "The stars urge you to DIE."

name: Curious Cumulus
text: [x]At the end of your turn, give your hero Divine Shield.
flavor: Hole in one!

name: Evergreen Stag
text: Elusive Lifesteal Taunt
flavor: Nevergreen Stag has Enrage, Overkill, and Honorable Kill.

name: Symbiosis
text: [x]Discover a Choose One card from another class.
flavor: It's the circle of life.

name: Alara'shi
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform minions in your hand into random Demons. (They keep their original stats and Cost.)
flavor: It's a bird! It's a plane! It's a bear! It's a felstalker! It's a doomguard! It's an imp!

name: Critter Caretaker
text: At the end of your turn, restore #3 Health to both heroes.
flavor: She teaches all her critters two things: heel and heal.

name: Tending Dragonkin
text: Battlecry: Copy the lowest Cost Beast in your hand.
flavor: Dogs are a dragon's best friend.

name: Demolition Renovator
text: Tradeable Battlecry: Destroy an enemy location.
flavor: "Look, the Sire said he wanted something more open concept..."

name: Ashleaf Pixie
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, gain Divine Shield and Lifesteal.
flavor: Why don't you make like a burning world tree and ashleave???

name: Ursoc
text: Battlecry: Attack ALL other minions. Deathrattle: Resurrect any this killed.
flavor: The great bear lord was so mighty that the Nightmare could only corrupt his spirit, not his strength.

name: Gnawing Greenfin
text: Battlecry: Get a random Murloc.
flavor:
"Are you eating bark again!?"
"Gnawwwww...."

name: Tranquil Treant
text: Deathrattle: Both players gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavor: "Cut down my trunk and make a Mana Crystal," said the tree. "Then you can ramp away... and be happy."

name: Eggbasher
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +4 Attack.
flavor: We could do this the over-easy way or the over-hard way.

name: Monstrous Mosquito
text: At the end of your turn, give your other minions +1 Attack.
flavor: I know every creature is valuable in the ecosystem of life. But these guys SUCK.

name: Bonechill Stegodon
text: Deathrattle: Deal 6 damage to three random enemies.
flavor: Cold blooded. Bad to the bone. Needs a sweater.

name: Spirit Gatherer
text: Battlecry: Get a Wisp. Imbue your Hero Power.
flavor: They call him the Wisp Whisperer.

name: Envoy of the Glade
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform all Neutral cards in your deck into random Druid ones.
flavor: Announce Gladeness.

name: Ominous Nightmares
text: [x]Choose One - Deal $1 damage to all minions; or Give a damaged minion +2/+2.
flavor: Everyone keeps talking about nightmares, but I don't see any horses?

name: Lightmender
flavor: How many lightmenders does it take to mend a lightorb?

name: Fae Trickster
text: Deathrattle: Draw a spell that costs (5) or more.
flavor: Muahaha they'll never see this spell that costs (5) or more coming!!

name: Tormented Dreadwing
text: Deathrattle: Draw 2 Dragons. Reduce their Costs by (1).
flavor: People say you can't see clearly through corruption, but you have more eyes than ever!

name: Dreamwarden
text: [x]Taunt. Battlecry: If there is a card in your deck that didn't start there, draw it and gain +2/+2.
artist: L. Lullabi & I. Campelo da Silva
flavor: This is advanced dreamcatching.

name: Aegis of Light
text: Summon a random 2-Cost minion and give it Taunt. Imbue your Hero Power.
flavor: "Try scooching together! The arrows are getting through!"

name: Siphoning Growth
text:
Destroy a friendly
minion to gain 8 Armor.
flavor: No thanks. This one's all yours, bud.

name: Immortalized in Stone
text: Summon a 4/8, 2/4, and 1/2 Elemental with Taunt.
flavor: They all secretly have 'Deathrattle: Become very mortalized.'

name: Bulwark of Azzinoth
text:
[x]Whenever your hero would
take damage, this loses
 1 Durability instead.
flavor: This plate turned shield you shall wield, praying its powers fel will serve you well.

name: The Soularium
text: Draw 3 cards. They are Temporary.
flavor: Worst field trip ever.

name: Spark of Life
text: Choose One - Discover a Mage spell; or Discover a Druid spell.
flavor: Just don't spark that life too close to the World Tree.

name: Stellar Balance
text: Get a Moonfire and a Starfire. Give them Spell Damage +1.
flavor: Famously, Moonfire and Starfire are about equal in power.

name: Deathchiller
text:
[x]After you cast a spell,
deal 1 damage to two
random enemies.
flavor: Man, death is like the most chill state... you've got nothing to do but relax.

name: Tomb Guardians
text: Summon two 2/2 Zombies with Taunt. Spend 4 Corpses to give them Reborn.
flavor: An absolute thriller.

name: Felrattler
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: It only rattles when YOU'RE in danger.

name: Flipper Friends
text: [x]Choose One - Summon a 6/6 Orca with Taunt; or six 1/1 Otters with Rush.
flavor: Despite the harsh conditions, friends can still be found under the sea.

name: Mountain Bear
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two 2/4 Cubs with Taunt.
flavor: If they want your picnic basket, I recommend giving it to them.

name: Wound Prey
text: Deal $1 damage. Summon a 1/1 Hyena with Rush.
flavor: You steal the cranberry juice, you pay the price.

name: Vulgar Homunculus
text: Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
flavor: Fortunately he has an even number of fingers.

name: Fiendish Servant
text: [x]Deathrattle: Give this minion's Attack to a random friendly minion.
flavor: Putting the "r" in fiend.

name: Demonic Assault
text: [x]Deal $3 damage. Summon two 1/3 Voidwalkers with Taunt.
flavor: Right next to the demonic pepper.

name: Lie in Wait
text: [x]Quest: Shuffle cards into your deck, 5 times. Reward: Master Dusk.
flavor: Day 2. Our first night in the Crater was a tad rough on this old shell. I can’t shake the feeling that we’re being watched. I swear I saw a glint of shining silver in the dark. I was going to ask Umbra about it at breakfast, but she never turned up.

name: High Cultist Herenn
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two Deathrattle minions from your deck. They fight!
flavor: "Hello." - Cultist Herenn

name: Archaios
text:
[x]Whenever another
friendly minion attacks,
set its Health equal to
this minion's Health.
flavor: She's a health influencer.

name: Spirit of the Kaldorei
text: Taunt, Lifesteal Battlecry: If you used your Hero Power this turn, gain +3/+3.
flavor: We brought magic to this world, but destruction may take it away.

name: Avatar of Destruction
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Deal 9 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: Master of all ONE element!

name: Ancient of Yore
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, gain 5 Armor and draw a card at the end of your turn.
flavor: Ancient of my what?

name: Babbling Bookcase
text: Battlecry: Add 2 random Mage spells to your hand.
flavor: Babbling Bookcase is quickly becoming one of my favorite cards. It's just so positive and generous. Practically costs nothing at all at three mana you drop him on the board and that chill guy gives you two spells to use later in the game.

name: Poison Breath
text: Give a friendly Undead Poisonous.
flavor: Try not to let your breath get so bad it starts gaining Bonus Effects.

name: Twilight Mender
text: Deathrattle: Get a random Holy and Shadow spell.
flavor: The Gravedawn Glade is FULL of indecisive Priests.

name: Gravedawn Voidbulb
text: Summon a random 4-Cost minion and give it Taunt. Kindred: Do it again.
flavor: How many Gravedawns does it take to screw in a Voidbulb?

name: Gravedawn Sunbloom
text: Draw 2 cards. Kindred: This costs (2) less.
flavor: So holy it photosynthesizes itself!

name: Dive the Golakka Depths
text: Repeatable Quest: Summon 5 Murlocs. Reward: Murlocs you summon gain +1/+1.
flavor: Day 5. Elise had a hunch that the Lost City may be hidden deep beneath the Golakka Hot Springs. Niri swam down and discovered a beautiful cavern! The Murlocs may not be hiding an entrance to the city, but it seems they do have a few secrets.

name: Rockskipper
text: Battlecry: Get a 1-Cost Rock that deals $3 damage.
flavor: Don't step on a stream or you'll break your mama's spleen.

name: Hot Spring Glider
text: Battlecry: Your next Murloc costs (1) less. Kindred: And gains Divine Shield.
flavor: It's an important survival instinct to keep a low profile in Un'Goro Crater. Gargl will not survive long.

name: Steamfin Thief
text: Kindred: Summon two 1/1 Murlocs with Rush.
flavor: Dial M for Murlocs.

name: Creature of the Sacred Cave
text: [x]At the end of your turn, recast a random Holy spell you cast this turn (targets this if possible).
flavor: Really likes being read to.

name: Death Metal Knight
text: [x]Taunt Costs Health instead of Mana if your hero was healed this turn.
flavor: He prefers listening to bands dead rather than live.

name: Dream Rager
text: Elusive
flavor: "Just try and ping me now!"

name: Dread Raptor
text: Battlecry: Draw a Deathrattle minion that costs (3) or less. Kindred: It costs (0).
flavor: "I AM THE CLAW!"

name: Reanimate the Terror
text: [x]Quest: Spend 15 Corpses. Reward: Tyrax, Bone Terror.
flavor: Day 11. We’ve been betrayed! Umbra has been meeting secretly with the Cult of the Damned to plan a coup. She and High Cultist Herenn used shadow magic to raise an undead dinosaur army! Tortolla preserve us, the fate of the Lost City rests in our hands.

name: Paleomancy
text: Discover an Undead. Spend 5 Corpses to keep all 3 instead.
flavor: Death finds a way.

name: Crypt Map
text: Discover a Frost Rune card. If you play it this turn, also pick one of the others.
flavor: Solving a maze is easy. Just hug the left wall and don't get eaten by dinosaurs!

name: Reanimated Pterrordax
text: Rush, Lifesteal Costs Corpses instead of Mana.
flavor: Ptruly pterrifying.

name: Hungering Ancient
text: [x]At the end of your turn, eat a minion in your deck and gain its stats. Deathrattle: Add them to your hand.
flavor: This guy puts the horror in horrorticulture.

name: Meadowstrider
text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Put a Meadowstrider on the bottom of your deck. It costs (1).
flavor: Pwease stop meadowing in my affaiws.

name: Windswept Pageturner
text:
[x]After you summon an
Elemental, deal 3 damage
to a random enemy.
flavor: This story will blow you away.

name: Sizzling Swarm
text:
Deal $3 damage.
Summon that many 2/1 Sizzling Cinders.
flavor: 'Can someone open a window? It's a little swarm in here!

name: Volcanic Thrasher
text: Battlecry: Draw a Fire spell. Kindred: Give it Spell Damage +2.
flavor: Very friendly, but be careful when it asks to play fetch.

name: Mechanized Magma
text:
Whenever you play a
Fire spell, gain stats
equal to its Cost.
flavor: Its volcanic strength powers its mechanical arm... and also its normal arm.

name: Conjured Bookkeeper
text: Deathrattle: Draw a spell. Kindred: Summon a copy of this.
flavor: In charge of cleaning up after the Library Rager.

name: Lava Flow
text: Deal $2 damage to the lowest Health enemy, three times. Overload: (1)
flavor: The lava must flow.

name: Spirit of the Mountain
text: Quest: Play 6 minions of unique types. Reward: Ashalon.
flavor: Day 10. A Tortollan named Bralma took Niri, Elise, and I deep into the mountain. She showed us how the Tortollans move lava up from the base of the volcano through a system of “lavaqueducts.” I was shocked to find a pack of Volcanosaurs living there!

name: Reach Equilibrium
text: [x]Quest: Cast 4 Holy spells Reward: Life's Breath. Quest: Cast 4 Shadow spells. Reward: Death's Touch.
flavor: Day 6. Today we found ourselves in a glade tormented by conflicting Holy and Shadow magic. At its center were two enormous Elementals, like opposite sides of the same coin. I hope one day we'll return here to see this broken place restored to peace.

name: Resuscitate
text: Resurrect a 1, 2, and 3-Cost minion. Give them Reborn.
flavor: This mud bath really does make you feel reborn.

name: Violet Treasuregill
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast a random spell from your deck that costs (2) or less (targets this if possible).
flavor: His brother Violent was banned from the colony.

name: Gladesong Siren
text: Lifesteal Costs (1) if you've played a Holy and Shadow spell this turn.
flavor: When she shifts into minor key she really throws the void-holy balance out of whack.

name: Glade Ecologist
text: [x]Deathrattle: Get a 1-Cost Holy spell that gives a minion +2 or -2 Health.
flavor: The dude minored in Underfel Biology. Now that's a renaissance Tortollan!

name: Wilted Shadow
text: [x]Lifesteal Whenever you heal an enemy, this attacks it.
flavor: The shadow shall burn you!

name: Dinositter
text:
[x]At the end of your
turn, reduce the Cost
of a random Beast in
your hand by (1).
flavor: "You aren't leaving this log until you finish your greens."

name: Cower in Fear
text:
Deal $3 damage
to a minion. The next
Beast you play this
turn costs (2) less.
flavor: Mother Duck's fourth duckling got lost in Un'Goro Crater.

name: Odd Map
text: [x]Discover an odd-Attack Beast. If you play it this turn, also pick one of the others.
flavor: I don't EVEN know where this goes!

name: Ravasaur Matriarch
text: [x]Kindred: Deal damage to an enemy minion equal to this minion's Attack.
flavor: The female Ravasaur is 30% larger than the male. And 100% more aggressive.

name: Story of Carnassa
text: Shuffle ten 1-Cost 3/2 Raptors into your deck with "Battlecry: Draw a card."
flavor: "... and ALL TEN Raptors were at the top of the deck!"

name: Grazing Stegodon
text: At the end of your turn, gain +1 Attack (even while in hand or deck).
flavor: He's a growing boy. :)

name: Supreme Dinomancy
text: Give +2/+2 to all Beasts in your hand, deck, and battlefield.
flavor: Not anyone can be a great dinomancer. But a great dinomancer can come from anywhere.

name: Wave of Tar
text:
Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions. Enemy minions cost
(2) more next turn.
flavor: "Watch out for my WAVE OF TAR!!! Just... stand still for a minute."

name: Flight of the Firehawk
text: Draw two minions of different minion types. Give them +2/+2.
flavor: Also the name of a famous Tortollan orchestral arrangement.

name: Ravenous Devilsaur
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a minion. Kindred: Gain its stats.
artist: L. Lullabi & I. Campelo da Silva
flavor: You're not you when you're ravenous.

name: Cinderfin
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/1 Sizzling Cinder.
flavor:
"Don't play with fire."
"But they're my friends!"

name: Bralma Searstone
text:
Your Elementals deal
1 extra damage.
flavor: She makes a mean molten lava cake.

name: Cryosleep
text: Deal $4 damage and draw a card. Kindred: Draw another.
flavor: You mad? Cryobout it.

name: TREEEES!!!
text: Choose a minion. Summon four 2/2 Treants that attack it.
flavor: Photo synth THIS, fool!

name: Story of Barnabus
text:
Draw a minion.
If it has 5 or more Attack, give it +5 Health and gain 5 Armor.
flavor: "Once there was a giant dinosaur. He was so giant that everyone died. The end."

name: Ravenous Flock
text: At the start of your next turn, summon three 2/1 Hatchlings.
flavor: It's a flock of screamgulls!

name: Hatchery Helper
text: [x]Battlecry: Give your other minions with 2 or less Attack +1/+2 and Taunt.
flavor: Yeah, painting patterns on the eggs is SUPER helpful J'an.

name: Eternal Bloodpetal
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 0/1 Eternal Seedling.
flavor: The crab grass of Un'Goro.

name: Life Cycle
text:
Destroy a minion. Summon a random minion of the same
Cost to replace it.
flavor: It's the cyyyyyycle of liiiiiife.

name: Hybridization
text: Draw a 1, 2, 3, and 4-Cost minion. Kindred: They cost (1) less.
flavor: You take the blue flower -- the story ends, you wake up in the inn and believe whatever you want to believe. You take the red flower -- you stay in Un'Goro, and I show you how deep the Gorishi tunnel goes.

name: Skyscreamer Eggs
text: Deathrattle: Summon four 2/1 Hatchlings.
flavor: Aaaaaaaaaaahmlette

name: Restore the Wild
text: Quest: Fill your board on 3 of your turns. Reward: The Everbloom.
flavor: Day 3. We happened upon a clearing filled with dangerous Bloodpetals. As I was noting our findings, the world went dark. My vision is perfect of course, but it appeared as though a large flying shape was blocking out the sun! Confounding indeed.

name: Ready the Fleet
text: Give +1/+2 to a friendly minion and your other minions that share a type with it.
flavor: The Fleet is on fleek.

name: Submerged Map
text: [x]Discover a Murloc. If you play it this turn, also pick one of the others.
flavor: Sure, it leads straight to Latorvia. How long can you hold your breath?

name: Reluctant Wrangler
text: [x]Reborn Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Undead Beast with Taunt.
flavor: "It's not that I never wanted a pet. I didn't want THIS pet."

name: The Food Chain
text: Quest: Play a 1, 3, 5, and 7-Attack Beast. Reward: Shokk.
flavor: Day 1. The search begins! I joined Elise Starseeker at the outskirts of the Crater, as well as a Tortollan named Umbra and a most curious gnome named Niri. Embarking into the jungle, we stumbled upon the largest tracks I’ve ever laid eyes on!

name: Pterrordax Egg
text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Pterrordax that steals 1 Health from all other minions.
flavor: When you crack this egg, it cracks you right back.

name: Story of Galvadon
text: Give a minion three random Bonus Effects.
flavor: "...so I gave him +12 Attack and Windfury -- and you won't believe this -- he LIVED."

name: Hive Map
text: [x]Discover a Fel spell. If you play it this turn, also pick one of the others.
flavor: The perfect map of where to never ever ever ever ever go.

name: Fumigate
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion and all others of the same minion type.
flavor: Stink bomb go!

name: Infestation
text: [x]Get two 1-Cost Gorishi Stingers. Each one deals $2 damage and summons a 2/1 Grub with Rush.
flavor: NOT THE WASPS!

name: Silithid Queen
text: Rush Kindred: Give your hero +5 Attack this turn.
flavor: Yaaaaaaass Silithid Queen, stiiiing.

name: Merchant of Legend
text: Battlecry: Discover a Legendary minion. Shuffle the other two into your deck.
flavor: "Tortollan has knives if you have coin."

name: Cultist Map
text: Discover a card from your deck. If you play it this turn, also pick one of the others.
flavor: Are the Shrouded Shells actually great trackers, or are the Cult of the Damned just REALLY bad about leaving secret maps lying around?

name: Neferset Weaponsmith
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a random weapon from another class. Combo: Give it +2 Attack.
flavor: Neferset your drink on the table without a coaster.

name: Knockback
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to a minion (improved for each time you've shuffled cards into your deck).
flavor: Every day he's scufflin'

name: Interrogation
text: Shuffle three 3/3 Ninjas with Stealth into your deck that are Summoned When Drawn.
flavor: "Spill the tea or I'll end your entire career, sis."

name: Underbrush Tracker
text: [x]Rush Costs (1) less for each time you've shuffled cards into your deck.
flavor: An expert at tracking the elusive Adaptive Amalgam.

name: Eyes in the Sky
text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards in your enemy's deck. Pick one to put on top.
flavor: "I got eyes on Umbra's unstoppable undead army. I'll uh... stay wayyy up here."

name: Windpeak Wyrm
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 5 damage and gain 5 Armor. Kindred: Costs (3) less.
flavor: He's so anxious. Always winds up in knots.

name: Shellnado
text: Spend up to 5 Armor. For each spent, deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor: Spin to win!

name: Enter the Lost City
text: [x]Quest: Survive 10 turns. Reward: Latorvius, Gaze of the City.
flavor: Day 8. We’ve done it! As night fell, we came upon a brilliantly glowing tunnel guarded by two slumbering Tol’vir. With silent footsteps, we walked through and emerged into the heart of the Lost City! I’m sure my people will welcome us with open arms.

name: Platysaur
text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Deathrattle: Discard it.
flavor: "Yup yup yup!"

name: Tar Tyrant
text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal Has +6 Attack during your opponent's turn.
flavor: Why would they put a waterfall here if there wasn't something cool behind it?

name: Elise the Navigator
text: Battlecry: If your deck started with 10 cards of different Costs, craft a custom location.
flavor: "I've seen that stump before. We must be getting close!"

name: Latorvian Armorer
text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to an enemy minion. If it dies, gain 5 Armor.
flavor: All it needs now is a nice coat of blue paint!

name: Insect Claw
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 2/1 Grub with Rush.
flavor: Get your grubby claws off me!

name: Escape the Underfel
text: Quest: Play 5 Temporary cards. Reward: Underfel Rift.
flavor: Day 7. A terrible day! The ground opened beneath us, and we fell head over shell into an accursed rift! Fel choked my keen senses, and demonic beasts emerged from the fog. Thank goodness Umbra was able to use her magic to ward them off while we escaped.

name: Caustic Fumes
text: Destroy an enemy minion. Kindred: Deal $2 damage to all minions.
flavor: If the fumes don't get them, the fumes might.

name: Fortify
text:
[x]Gain 3 Armor.
Deal damage equal
to your Armor to an
enemy minion.
flavor: With vitamins and minerals!

name: Bloodpetal Biome
text: Discover a Temporary 1-Cost minion.
flavor: The rash doesn't FEEL temporary.

name: Torga
text: Battlecry: Draw a Kindred card and another card that activates it.
flavor: Torga was killed, eaten, used to summon the undead and then used as a loudspeaker for spirits. But at least he's got a hell of a story to tell.

name: Gorishi Wasp
text: Rush. Whenever this takes damage, get a 1-Cost Gorishi Stinger.
flavor: This card is the wasp's elbows!

name: Unleash the Colossus
text: Quest: Deal exactly 2 damage to an enemy on your turn, 12 times. Reward: Gorishi Colossus.
flavor: Day 4. I am dismayed to report that we thought we'd found a hidden entrance to the Lost City, but in fact it was a Silithid Hive! We high-tailed it out of there faster than a goblin wearing rocket boots. I am not terribly fond of bugs.

name: Story of Sulfuras
text:
[x]Swap your Hero Power
to "Deal 8 damage
to a random enemy."
After 2 uses, swap back.
flavor: "...and there were seven minions on board, and it STILL hit the enemy hero!"

name: Endbringer Umbra
text: [x]Battlecry: Trigger the Deathrattles of 5 friendly minions that died this game.
flavor: After many years of exile, Umbra is so close to returning to her city. When she arrives, she will make sure the Tortollans get what they deserve...

name: Stormbrewer
text: Whenever this attacks, deal 3 damage to the target first. Kindred: Gain Rush.
flavor: It was a dark and stormy Elemental...

name: Relic Miner
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy the top card of your deck. Discover a card of the same Rarity.
flavor: "I struck gold! NOOOOOOOO!"

name: Spelunker
text: Battlecry: Your next Temporary card costs (2) less.
flavor: Echo... echo... repeatable this turn...

name: Cursed Catacombs
text: Discover a minion from your deck. Make it Temporary.
flavor: The minion is now permanently cursed. Temporarily.

name: Willful Watcher
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Destroy the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavor: I still don't know why he has a sword. Despite being in many battles, he really just watches.

name: City Defenses
text: Summon two 0/6 Security with Taunt. They gain +1 Attack when damaged.
flavor: These 0/6 Taunts have kept invaders out for centuries.

name: Stonecarver
text: At the end of your turn, give a random friendly damaged minion +2/+2.
flavor:
*clink*
*clink*
*clink*
*"D'oh!"

name: Nablya, the Watcher
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon copies of your damaged minions. Give the copies Rush.
flavor: Of course the Titans trust the Tortollans to take care of Un'Goro Crater. Nablya is just there as insurance.

name: Tyrannogill
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Summon three 2/1 Murlocs. Give them each a random Bonus Effect.
flavor: There's something fishy about that dinosaur...

name: Bugsquasher
text: Battlecry: Deal 6 damage to an enemy minion with a minion type.
flavor: The Tortollans would be nothing without their QA department.

name: Ido of the Threshfleet
text: [x]While this is alive, you get a 2-Cost Holy spell that gives a minion +2/+2 and Divine Shield.
flavor: Ido, therefore I am.

name: Titanographer Osk
text: Gains a random Titan ability in your hand that changes each turn.
flavor: Look at this Titangraph.

name: Maze Guide
text: Battlecry: Summon a random 2-Cost minion.
flavor: "And if you look to your left, you'll see an even larger statue of Sire Denathrius!"

name: Steamcleaner
text: Battlecry: Destroy ALL cards in both players' decks that didn't start there.
flavor: Business is slow since the anima shortage began. Things just don't get stained like they used to!

name: Questing Assistant
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played a Quest this game, deal 3 damage to an enemy minion.
flavor: Forget the Quest. Our new Quest is to make sure no harm ever comes to him.

name: Scalehide Kodo
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy the lowest Attack enemy minion. Kindred: The highest Attack instead.
flavor: Little Eeep and his pal Stomp are off to see the wonders of Un'Goro. First stop, Underfel!

name: The Forbidden Sequence
text: [x]Quest: Discover 8 cards. Reward: The Origin Stone.
flavor: Day 9. We were not welcomed with open arms, but with spears! Fortunately, Chief Esho took pity on us and called off the guards. Learning of Elise's expertise, a Titanographer whisked her away to the library. Umbra disappeared in the twisting streets...

name: Scrappy Scavenger
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a card with Cost equal to your remaining Mana Crystals.
flavor: "One second, I'm stashing this Ultragigasaur in my little satchel."

name: Unearthed Artifacts
text: [x]Summon a random 2-Cost minion. If you've Discovered this turn, summon a random 4-Cost minion instead.
flavor: The Tortollans live so long they're unearthing their OWN artifacts!

name: Razidir
text: [x]Battlecry: Discard a random card from your hand. Kindred: Your opponent's hand instead.
flavor: Be prepaaaaaaaaared! (by playing a Demon or Beast the previous turn.)

name: Ancient Stegodon
text: Battlecry: Choose to gain Taunt, Poisonous, or +1/+1.
flavor: I'm 30 years old.

name: Whirling Stormdrake
text: Rush, Windfury Kindred: Gain Immune this turn.
flavor: Summons storms. Breathes fire. But first, does a sick loop-de-loop.

name: Sizzling Cinder
text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: "Hey, I'm sizzlin' here!"

name: Curious Explorer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of a minion in your opponent's hand by (2).
flavor: "Wow, this flower's mouth is perfectly head-shaped."

name: Ancient Raptor
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose to gain +3 Attack, Divine Shield, or "Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Plants."
flavor: It prefers "Experienced."

name: Mountain Map
text: [x]Discover a minion with a type you haven't played. If you play it this turn, also pick one of the others.
flavor: See that part at the top? That's the top.

name: Ancient Pterrordax
text: [x]Battlecry: Choose to gain Stealth until your next turn, Elusive, or Windfury.
flavor: What's that sound? He's a terrible conductor.

name: Primal Sabretooth
text: [x]Stealth After this attacks and kills a minion, get a copy of it.
flavor: 100 dino birds versus 1 sabretooth. Who would win?

name: Ultragigasaur
flavor: Ultrasaur for scale.

name: Stranglevine
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion a random Bonus Effect and this Deathrattle.
flavor: "Wow, this human's head is perfectly mouth-shaped."

name: Story of Lakkari
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
discard a card and fill
your board with 3/2 Imps.
Lasts 3 turns.
flavor: Wow, the Tortollans really embellish these stories.

name: Crater Gator
text: [x]Battlecry: Until the start of your next turn, the enemy hero can't be healed.
flavor: See ya later Crater Gator!

name: Overgrown Horror
text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of minions in your hand with Dark Gifts by (2).
flavor: Fetch me the garden shears. The BIG shears.

name: Primalfin Challenger
text: Battlecry: Your next Kindred triggers twice.
flavor: "MURGRGLGLLGLLRRRG!!!!!!" There were no survivors.

name: Dissolving Ooze
text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion. Spit out the Bones of its Attack and Health into your hand.
flavor:
Ooze
Ooz
Oo
O

name: Petrified Ogre
text: [x]Starts Dormant. While Dormant, gain +2/+2 at the start of your turn. (50% chance to awaken instead.)
flavor: First, he was afraid...

name: Tortollan Storyteller
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
give +1/+1 to each friendly
minion of a different type.
flavor: "And then a turtle made it to the water!"

name: Crystal Tender
text: [x]Tradeable Battlecry: Gain empty Mana Crystals until both players have the same Mana.
flavor: "Hands off my tendies!"

name: Marshland Thresher
text: After you cast a spell, gain Divine Shield.
flavor: "Just remember, when we pose for pictures, look very shadowy and grainy."

name: Story of the Waygate
text:
[x]Reduce the Cost of cards
in your hand that didn't
start in your deck by (1).
flavor: "...and then a lot of people got mad."

name: Storage Scuffle
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Costs (0) if you've Discovered this turn.
flavor:
Flip and file!
Mix and shuffle!
Sort and swap!
Do the Storage Scuffle!

name: Spirit Guide
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Draw a Holy spell and a Shadow spell.
flavor:
"Hey Jake."
"Back again?"
"Yup."
"See you in 2 minutes."

name: Pterrorwing Ravager
text: Rush Kindred: Costs (2) less.
flavor: Turns out most things are skyscreamers if you drop them from high enough.

name: Whispering Stone
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Get 2 random Fel spells. They cost Health instead of Mana.
flavor: shhhhhh...

name: Blob of Tar
text: [x]Poisonous, Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 1/2 Blob with Poisonous and a 1/2 Blob with Taunt.
flavor: A tar is born.

name: Tunnel Terror
text: Deathrattle: Get two random Temporary 2-Cost minions.
flavor: And a tiny soul patch to match.

name: Loh, the Living Legend
text: Battlecry: Your minions cost (5) this game.
flavor: Pretty spry for a 4217 year old.

name: Ambush Predators
text: Summon a 1/1 Spitter with Stealth and Poisonous. Kindred: Do it again.
flavor: Ah, no wonder YOU'RE extinct.

name: Relic of Kings
text: Discover a spell from any class that costs (8) or more. It costs (1).
flavor: "Whoa, found a big plate!"

name: Falric
text: You gain twice as many Corpses as normal. Battlecry: Draw a card that spends Corpses.
flavor: God I freaking love pears.

name: Opu the Unseen
text: Stealth. Battlecry, Combo, and Deathrattle: Cast 'Fan of Knives'.
flavor: This is allegedly what Opu looks like. We will confirm if we ever see him.

name: Threshrider's Blessing
text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 and "Deathrattle: Summon a random 4-Cost minion."
flavor: #Blessed

name: Axe of the Forefathers
text: After your hero attacks, deal 1 damage to all minions.
flavor: ...and the axe of the beforefathers before the forefathers before him.

name: Gorishi Tunneler
text: Stealth After this attacks, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavor:
"This card is really boring."
"Nah, I really dig this card."

name: Entomologist Toru
text: [x]Battlecry: Put each minion in your hand into 0/1 Jars that cost (1). Break them to release the minions!
flavor: The lid. The lid. The lid. The lid. The lid. The lid.

name: Undercover Cultist
text: Taunt, Reborn Has +3 Attack while damaged.
flavor: Don't be suspicious, don't be suspicious.

name: Deathrot Maw
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a random Fel Beast.
flavor: Oh, don't worry, Deathy doesn't bite.

name: Krog, Crater King
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
set the Attack and Health of
all enemy minions to 1.
flavor: Who died and made him King of anything?

name: Netherspite Historian
text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a Dragon.
flavor: She can tell you all about the history of people not STANDING IN THE GREEN BEAM!

name: The Curator
text: Taunt Battlecry: Draw a Beast, Dragon, and Murloc from your deck.
flavor: The Curator guards Azeroth’s deadliest creatures, but it’s secretly terrified of squirrels.

name: Slagclaw
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 2/1 Sizzling Cinders. Kindred: Trigger your Sizzling Cinders' Deathrattles.
flavor: You can't just have the sizzle, you gotta have the cinders.

name: Menagerie Mug
text: [x]Battlecry: Give 3 random friendly minions of different minion types +1/+1.
flavor: He's a chip off the old jug.

name: Menagerie Jug
text: [x]Battlecry: Give 3 random friendly minions of different minion types +2/+2.
flavor: It's art imitating Battlegrounds imitating life.

name: Oasis Ally
text: [x]Secret: When a friendly minion is attacked, summon a 3/6 Water Elemental.
flavor: As gentle as a bellyflop.

name: Vibrant Squirrel
text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 4 Acorns into your deck. When drawn, summon a 2/1 Squirrel.
flavor: Oh, they're cute now. Just wait till they unleash a Savage Roar.

name: Veranus
text: Battlecry: Change the Health of all enemy minions to 1.
flavor: As an empty nester, she just misses her little ones.

name: Archmage Antonidas
text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a 'Fireball' spell to your hand.
flavor: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina's mentor. This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

name: Anachronos
text: [x]Battlecry: Send all other minions 2 turns into the future.
flavor: "That's it, you're all in time out!"

name: Finja, the Flying Star
text: [x]Stealth Whenever this attacks and kills a minion, summon 2 Murlocs from your deck.
flavor: The last true master of Finjitsu.

name: Prize Vendor
text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Each player draws a card.
flavor: He's just making sure they're real. Authentic tickets taste like strawberry.

name: Blowtorch Saboteur
text: Battlecry: Your opponent's next Hero Power costs (2) more.
flavor: Before he came along, we went through a lot of duct tape.

name: Redscale Dragontamer
text: Deathrattle: Draw a Dragon.
flavor: Sir Finley made this look a lot easier three expansions ago...

name: Greater Healing Potion
text: Restore #12 Health to a friendly character. Draw a card.
flavor: Filled with electrolytes!

name: Foxy Fraud
text: Battlecry: Your next Combo card this turn costs (2) less.
flavor: His other street con involves a druid. He can't pull it off without a plant.

name: Waggle Pick
text: [x]Deathrattle: Return a random friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavor: Kobolds informally refer to its effect as a deathwaggle.

name: Shaku, the Collector
text: [x]Stealth. Whenever this attacks, add a random card to your hand (from your opponent's class).
flavor: Aya even staged an intervention once, but Shaku still insists that he is not a hoarder.

name: Marshspawn
text: Battlecry: If you cast a spell last turn, Discover a spell.
flavor: Hopes to someday promote to Marshsqueen.

name: Jinyu Waterspeaker
text: [x]Battlecry: Restore #6 Health. Overload: (1)
flavor: Waterspeakers can tell the future! So the Jade Lotus employs them to speculate on the Auction House.

name: Dark Peddler
text: Battlecry: Discover a 1-Cost card.
flavor: I'm offering you a bargain here! This amazing vacuum cleaner for your soul!

name: I Know a Guy
text: Discover a Taunt minion. Give it +1/+2.
flavor: Well… a guy who knows a guy.

name: Fire Plume Phoenix
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage.
flavor: This is what happens when you use a volcano as a bird bath.

name: Chillmaw
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: If you're holding a Dragon, deal 3 damage to all minions.
flavor: Chillmaw keeps trying to ruin the Grand Tournament, and she would've done it too, if it weren't for those dang kids!

name: Zai, the Incredible
text: Battlecry: Copy the left- and right-most cards in your hand.
flavor: Following this act will be her younger brother, Frank the Mediocre.

name: Defias Ringleader
text: Combo: Summon a 2/1 Defias Bandit.
flavor: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

name: Blazing Invocation
text: [x]Discover a Battlecry minion. It costs (1) less.
flavor: A lot of shaman have started vaping their invocations.

name: Ravaging Ghoul
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all other minions.
flavor: But goes by "Ravishing Ghoul" when he hits the club.

name: Hookfist-3000
text:
After your hero attacks, gain 4 Armor and
draw a card.
flavor: But wait! There's more!

name: Sneed's Old Shredder
text: Deathrattle: Summon a random Legendary minion.
flavor: When Sneed was defeated in the Deadmines, his shredder was sold at auction to an anonymous buyer. (Probably Hogger.)

name: Octosari
text: Deathrattle: Draw 8 cards.
flavor: Eight arms of sand-flinging, foe-wringing, card-slinging fury!

name: Mo'arg Forgefiend
text: Taunt Deathrattle: Gain 8 Armor.
flavor: Enraged not by fel energies, but by an itchy nose he cannot scratch.

name: Sunfury Protector
text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Taunt.
flavor: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.

name: Vault Breaker
text: After you Discover a card, reduce its Cost by (1).
flavor: I've already told him 3 times to PUSH.

name: Story of Amara
text:
Set your hero's
Health to 40.
flavor: "Once upon a time... ok how about we just skip to the end?"

name: Tuskpiercer
text: [x]Deathrattle: Draw a Deathrattle minion.
flavor: It's the Barrens, everything has tusks! The Quilboar have tusks, the boars have tusks, the tusks have tusks.

name: Power Word: Shield
text:
Give a minion +2 Health.
Draw a card.
flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

name: Lightshower Elemental
text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Restore #8 Health to all friendly characters.
flavor: The forecast calls for light showers, but you won’t need an umbrella.

name: Malignant Horror
text: [x]Reborn At the end of your turn, spend 4 Corpses to summon a copy of this minion.
flavor: Pop goes the pustule.

name: Priestess of Fury
text: At the end of your turn, deal 6 damage randomly split among all enemies.
flavor: Furious that she only has six warglaives. The Sightless Watcher has eight! The fel is always greener on the other side.

name: Underlight Angling Rod
text: After your Hero attacks, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavor: "I said I wanted the ASHbringer not FISHbringer!"

name: Undercity Huckster
text: Deathrattle: Get a random card (from your opponent's class).
flavor: Psst! Wanna buy a random class card (from your opponent's class)?

name: Wailing Vapor
text:
[x]After you play an Elemental,
gain +1 Attack.
flavor: If you have The Vapors, your Humors might be imbalanced.

name: Cornelius Roame
text:
[x]At the start and end
 of each player's turn,
draw a card.
flavor: Raised two perfectly normal daughters. Then one died and brought doom to Stormwind.

name: Lorewalker Cho
text: Whenever a player casts a spell, put a copy into the other player’s hand.
flavor: Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria, but his favorite story is the one where Joey and Phoebe go on a road trip.

name: Wisp
flavor: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode. But why?

name: Violet Spellwing
text: Deathrattle: Add an 'Arcane Missiles' spell to your hand.
flavor: A bird in the hand is worth three missiles in the grave.

name: Terrorscale Stalker
text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
flavor: Likes to scare his friends half to death.

name: City Chief Esho
text: [x]Battlecry: If every minion in your deck shares a minion type, give your other minions +2/+2 (wherever they are).
flavor: "Let me esho you around!"

name: Niri of the Crater
text:
[x]Whenever you play a 1-Cost
minion, double its stats.
Whenever you cast a 1-Cost
spell, cast it twice.
flavor: Niri, Niri, Niri of the Crater, strong as they can be! HAAAAAEEHOOOOHEHOOOEAAAAAAAA!!!! Watch out for that tree!

name: Runaway Blackwing
text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
deal 10 damage to a
random enemy minion.
flavor: It has been 5 minutes since our last Azeroth Racing League violation.

name: Cloud Serpent
text: [x]Battlecry: Get a copy of another Elemental or Dragon in your hand.
flavor: Cloudy with a chance of Quest Rewards.
